name: AS_ADT_DSP_displayAuditActionCodeText
description: Given an audit action code, creates a richtext item of the correct color and text to describe the action
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!auditActionCodeDisplayDictionary: rule!AS_ADT_BL_buildAuditActionCodeDisplayDict(),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
    text: displayvalue(
      ri!actionCode,
      local!auditActionCodeDisplayDictionary.code,
      local!auditActionCodeDisplayDictionary.label,
      ""
    ) & " ",
    color: displayvalue(
      ri!actionCode,
      local!auditActionCodeDisplayDictionary.code,
      local!auditActionCodeDisplayDictionary.color,
      ""
    ),
    style: "STRONG"
  )
)
